scriptures.text: No temptation has overtaken you except what is common to mankind. And God is faithful; he will not let you be tempted beyond what you can bear. But when you are tempted, he will also provide a way out so that you can endure it.
Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.
The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in him, and he helps me. My heart leaps for joy, and with my song I praise him.
But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.
The Lord is close to the brokenhearted and saves those who are crushed in spirit.
For I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord, plans to prosper you and not to harm you, to give you hope and a future.

prayers: Lord, I'm struggling right now. Please give me Your strength to resist this temptation. Help me to remember who I am in You and the freedom You have for me.
Father, I feel weak and vulnerable. Please be my strength and shield. Help me to turn to You instead of my old ways.
Jesus, I need You right now. Please fill me with Your peace and help me to make the right choice. I trust in Your power to help me overcome.
Holy Spirit, please guide me away from this temptation. Give me the wisdom to see the way out that You have provided.
God, I'm feeling overwhelmed. Please remind me of Your love and help me to find my strength in You alone.

worshipPlaylists.title: Peace & Strength
worshipPlaylists.description: Songs of peace and strength for difficult moments

worshipPlaylists.title: Worship for Freedom
worshipPlaylists.description: Uplifting worship music to help you focus on God

worshipPlaylists.title: Healing & Restoration
worshipPlaylists.description: Songs about God's healing and restoration power
